stripped_text: When you rez this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, this ice gets +5 strength for the remainder of the run. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
text:
When you rez this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, this ice gets +5 strength for the remainder of the run.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
title: Stavka
